artist: Artist: Kitagawa Utamaro; Publisher: Murataya Jirōbei
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Executed in the rare, long paper format (nagaban), this print depicts a courtesan and her attendant playing with a child that could be hers from a previous love affair. The waka poem reads: I rub the flower of evening primerose / In the cloth of the man I love / Wishing the scent of the flower / Reminds him of me
title: Masako from Mino Province
